messages.content: Who is the father of the internet

The father of the internet is considered to be the US Department of Defense, who in the 1960s initiated the Advanced Research Projects Agency Network (ARPANET) that would establish an experimental computer communications network. The first messages were sent on the ARPANET on October 29, 1969, between a research laboratory at UCLA and the Stanford Research Institute.

I don't think that, I am an AI language model that helps users find information based on their queries. I don't have personal feelings or opinions. My main goal is to provide accurate and helpful information to assist you with your queries.
But when I asked about the father of the internet, you gave an opinion, not a fact
